title: Bg. 11.25
sanskrit: दंष्ट्राकरालानि च ते मुखानिदृष्ट्वैव कालानलसन्निभानि ।दिशो न जाने न लभे च शर्मप्रसीद देवेश जगन्निवास ॥ २५ ॥
transliteration: daṁṣṭrā-karālāni ca te mukhānidṛṣṭvaiva kālānala-sannibhānidiśo na jāne na labhe ca śarmaprasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa
literary_trans: O Lord of lords, O refuge of the worlds, please be gracious to me. I cannot keep my balance seeing thus Your blazing deathlike faces and awful teeth. In all directions I am bewildered.O Lord of lords, O refuge of the worlds, please be gracious to me. I cannot keep my balance seeing thus Your blazing deathlike faces and awful teeth. In all directions I am bewildered.
